name: EditorExtensions
title: Editor Extensions
author: raiguard
description:
Editor Extensions extends the Factorio Map Editor with additional tools and features, and adds a whole set of items/entities to make testing easier. Easily switch between the map editor and normal play, generate or destroy unlimited items, fluids, electricity, and heat, gain access to energy-free and superfast version of many vaniila entities, and more!

Designed to be a replacement for Creative Mode and Infinity Mode.
